link.title: Home
link.script:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: It's an exciting time to be a Raider! There is much to be proud of with our recent building improvements as well as great things happening in the classrooms. It is our desire to see each student receive a high-quality education through a combination of excellent classroom instruction as well as home and community support.

Please let me know if there is anything I can do to assist you. Should you have a question or concern, do not hesitate to contact your child's teacher or me by calling our school office at 573-729-5618.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.strong: In accordance with state law, eligible students may participate in virtual courses or a full-time program of instruction through the Missouri Course Access and Virtual School Program (MOCAP). Parents and students interested in learning more about virtual courses can click here for more information. Please contact Doug Dunn, Superintendent at 573-729-5618 or ddunn@oakhillr1.k12.mo.us with any questions concerning this program.
